title: FraseApp
title_notFavorite: You don't have any featured quotes yet
alert_favoriteAddedMessage: You will now see it more often in the 'Get Inspired' section. The more you like it, the more often it will appear.
about_paragraph1: Sometimes an ordinary statement can have a strong impact on us. A well-chosen aphorism or motivational quote can help overcome a setback or decide on an important action.
about_paragraph2: It is also sometimes important to remind yourself of the promises you made to yourself.
about_paragraph3_part1: This is exactly what FraseApp is for. You choose your favorite
about_paragraph3_part2: , and later the app will remind you about them.
about_paragraph4: When viewing phrases, you can rate them, which affects how often the phrase will appear.
about_link_start: Start by choosing a few phrases from our list.
